original_text: So they left all the people behind. They went away in a boat together to a quiet place.
korean_text: 이에 배를 타고 따로 한적한 곳에 갈새

sentences.original_text: So they left all the people behind.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 모든 사람을 뒤에 두고 떠났습니다.

sentences.original_text: They went away in a boat together
